name: Protect Pumpkin Palace from the Phreaky Phantom Phuckers!
name_original: Protect Pumpkin Palace from the Phreaky Phantom Phuckers!
description:
Ghosts of all different kinds have come to tear down Mr. Pumpkin's cannibalistic pumpkin restaurant, the Pumpkin Palace!

Good thing Mr. Pumpkin always stays strapped with specialized anti-ghost ammo!

Shoot those motherphuckers down and protect your business! 

See how long you can last! Can you get past level 15?

Controls:

Change Ammo: Q, E / Mouse Wheel

Fire: Left  Mouse Click

Move: A, D

Jump: W / Space Bar

Mute Music: M

All sounds, music, art, and programming done by Elijah Southman.

Made in Java with no external libraries.
